website_summaries.verdict: This case is reliable and leaves a decent amount of room for cables and accessories.
pros: Whether you're looking to carry and protect an Xbox or PlayStation, this is a great case with a comfortable shoulder strap
A strap holds the console in place, and modular compartments can hold several controllers, wires, and a headset
cons: The fabric is somewhat flimsy and thin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for PS4 PRO!
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I was looking for! It fit all my accessories + my PS4 Pro. Love the color combo black and blue as well!
customer_reviews.author: Lee M.

customer_reviews.title: Gamer approved.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He travels from time to time and takes his ps4 and things that go with it, but i was concerned about the bag he was using.. I felt it was not secure enough for his gadgets. So i bought him this one and he loves it. He already has tried it out for a trial run. He was extreamly happy that nothing was moving around. He especially loves the adjustable velcro strips.
customer_reviews.author: Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Can’t believe it took me so long to realize how badly I needed one of these!
customer_reviews.text: For many years, I was always transporting my PS4 from place to place in the original box. It was a very poor decision, but I never thought a case would even exist. Yet much to my surprise, there is..and a ton of them at that! After doing a little research, I came to the conclusion this would be the case for me..and so far, it’s been a wonderful decision! Very sturdy, well made, comes with a warranty, and looks clean to top it off! My PS4, all accessories, and even games fit comfortably and seem quite secure! Highly recommend this case!!
customer_reviews.author: DirtNasty

customer_reviews.title: It feels like the case is worth the money you pay for ...
customer_reviews.text: With adjustable compartments for the ps4 accessories this case is just what I needed. The padding helps out with protection. I can fit my ps4 headphones, 2 controllers, 6 games, hdmi & powercord, and last but not least my PlayStation 4! This was defenitly worth the buy. It feels like the case is worth the money you pay for it. Will buy again if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: FF1704

customer_reviews.title: Best bag I've found for PS4 that also holds many accessories
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bag I've found that securely holds my PS4 and all my accessories. There's room for the system, portable hard drive, 2 controllers, ethernet cord, usb cords, hdmi cords, power cord, vertical stand, PS Gold headset, 13-inch gaming monitor with stand, usb hub and 3 game cases. It's easy to take across town or across the country. Bag is high quality and feel very sturdy. You can move the padded walls on the accessory side. Velcro strap holds PS4 (and my gaming monitor) tightly. I would recommend this bag to anyone who travels with their PS4.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: This is the case you need to take your PS4/PS4Pro on the Go!
customer_reviews.text: My PS4 Pro fits in is nicely. It's very snug, and feels secure. I can also fit my PS Vita in here with two controllers, and all the necessary cables etc. This bag is more customizable that I thought I would be. I can also fit my laptop in the front zipper as well with everything previous listed. If you're looking for a handy carry case for your game console that you can take with you on a plane, then look no further than this. I haven't bothered with a carry case for a system since my Sega Genesis and I'm just as impressed by this case as I was with that one.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Good for nearly any console
customer_reviews.text: I actually own 2 of these cases, one for my Xbox 360 and Ps4. While the 360 with its cords and everything, it's just a bit of a tight fit, but workable. But it's much simpler with the ps4 since it only comes with 2 cords. With that, you can fit so many more items. You can fit pretty much everything for your ps4 in this case. The inside is even customizable, so you can organize it the way you want. If you are looking for a good way to transport your ps4, this is a good buy. :)
customer_reviews.author: Silverware Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Handles your PS4 Pro and all the accessories
customer_reviews.text: Great case fpr my PS4 Pro. I had a business trip that kept me in a hotel room for a week, with nothing to do every day after meetings. The case held everything, my PS4 Pro, including controller, headphones, cable, games, and extension cords, with room to spare. Made the trip bearable.
customer_reviews.author: ajax

customer_reviews.title: Decent product. God awful delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Decent case, padding is alright, could stand to be a bit cheaper but it's good nonetheless. Be wary of the middle flap because it's not as sturdy as it seems and be wary of shipping from this company. It was awful for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob S.

customer_reviews.title: Good carrying bag but not a tight fit.
customer_reviews.text: They should've called a bag a not a case. I bought this product thinking that it will be a hard case but it turns out that it is not. I'm a little disappointed about that however, it got the job done of allowing me to travel with my PS4 and accessories with out taking too much space on my luggage. The only thing is that it is not a tight fit and there are a lot of wiggle room so make sure you packed the bag with clothes so that the accessories and console to move to much.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Fits my PS4 Pro perfect, used it yesterday and if you have the ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits my PS4 Pro perfect, used it yesterday and if you have the Pro model, this is the only one I've found so far that actually fits it, and is secure
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Very nice case it self buuuut the Velcro movable patches and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case it self buuuut the Velcro movable patches and the top flap allows your controllers to fall out
customer_reviews.author: Jared Bankston

customer_reviews.title: Great case wonderful protection.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it yet but once I opened the box and saw it I knew it was a MUCH better carrying case for my PS4 than the cheap one I spent almost the same price on.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrick

customer_reviews.title: Objective Complete
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wasn’t packing much for a trip I was taking where all I needed was my PS4 and the bag carried my PlayStation, cables, controllers, my headset, along some of my movies and video games. This back was EVERYTHING I needed, I highly recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Heger

customer_reviews.title: Great storage for my ps4!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with how this came out. The ps4 fits snugly and I have room for all my cables, controllers, and accessories with room to spare. I am using something else to hold and transport my games, but I could use some of the extra space to move some of my games. The one thing that could be better is the price of course. It is a little higher in price than I'd like, but after searching around, I got 2 of them. (ps3 needs one too!) It serves my needs and is exactly what I'm looking for.
customer_reviews.author: michael s

customer_reviews.title: Fits my PS4 Pro perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I use this for travel constantly. Works great at airport security. Just unzip and open it up. PS4 Pro on one side, accessories and cables on the other - don't have to remove it from the case. Great case with plenty of room. Fits under the airplane seat well. Very durable - I use this thing all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Bolin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my husbands ps4. Was tired of him trying to cram his gaming equipment into one of my small bags, so I bought him this. It’s great! Everything fits perfectly and it’s a safer way to tote it around!
customer_reviews.author: Kyra

customer_reviews.title: Great item perfect for ps4 pro!
customer_reviews.text: Fits ps4 pro perfectly dont have to take out the controller plug in for my astro and risk losing it. Even has room for 3 controllers, a fire tv box and all. The cords needed.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: PlayStation 3 Case!!! I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this case. It has Velcro dividers that can be removed. I use this case for my PlayStation 3 (big edition). It fits very well. It also has a shoulder strap which looks very strong. I was searching for a case that I can take my PlayStation 3 any where when necessary. If you’re searching for a good case for your PlayStation 3 this will not disappoint and your search will be over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling with PS4 Pro
customer_reviews.text: My husband travels for work, and on a particularly long trip wanted to take his gaming system. This case worked great to protect his PS4 Pro and he really liked the adjustable compartments for his accessories, like the controller and headset. Exactly what he needed!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie M

customer_reviews.title: Nice case for Xbox even if tight fit
customer_reviews.text: Saw this case and got it for my son's xBox. I know it notes for PlayStation, but it is the same dimensions as the green one for xBox they carry. Just a different color to mimic the color of the company logo. Only issue is that the xBox is a bit higher than the side. Other than that, it is a great game case as it does what it needs to do and carry.
customer_reviews.author: D. Grove

customer_reviews.title: 2 years later and it’s still like new.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case about 2 years ago to carry my PlayStation to work where I have an insane amount of down time. Ive used it 5 days a week for almost 2 years and it’s still in just as good shape as the day I got it. Amazing case for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Fallen1

customer_reviews.title: Holds Everything!
customer_reviews.text: Just got the bag an hour ago so no "tried and true" claims but it feels well made to start off. The amount of stuff I have set in it right now is ridiculous and includes: v1 PS4, 2 Dual-Shock 4 controllers, 1 mini wired gamepad, 2 Playstation Move controllers, Playstation camera, Scullcandy SLYR headset, Seagate 4TB Game Drive and all required cables to run everything. The best part is it's snug without feeling stressed, I call that a win for a first impression.
customer_reviews.author: Wendall Alan Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Just what was needed!
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag for my son bc he's back and forth to his grandparents house and it was just what he needed. It holds everything nicely. System, controllers, headset, cords and a couple games. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: amanda velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Accessories Carrying Case
customer_reviews.text: It's very useful for traveling purposes. I liked how I can put all my ps4 accessories into this bag alone. Would buy again if I had a Xbox One for sure. But be warned, careful not to drop.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent C.

customer_reviews.title: Protect your PS4
customer_reviews.text: Good interior padding for the PS4, and accessories including headset, controllers and games. Must have if you plan to transport your game system from place to place.
customer_reviews.author: Dan The Man

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Transporting your PS4 Pro or slim on the go
customer_reviews.text: This Bag is Great for traveling/transporting your PS4 along with its games and even a headset. I use it for my PS4 Pro and it fits in the back just fine under the velcro. Be advised that you will have to remove the small velcro patch in the system section of the bag if you have a PS4 Pro(not a big deal at all). Love the shoulder strap, the carrying handle, and the 3 year warranty this product includes if you register it online
customer_reviews.author: John Poole

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loved it plenty of room for stuff you need to bring along. He brings the PS everywhere.

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: I am happy that bought this product. I reached to the vendor with prompt contact. I am also happy that these cases are universal no matter with console people own.

customer_reviews.title: Great product with a good amount of room
customer_reviews.text: Everything fits great...only thing that isnt quite the best is that the seperation panels move a little easier than I'd like
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Not bulky and lots of room.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son! It’s not bulky and his play station and accessories all fit perfectly with room to spare. The colors are great too!!!! We travel a lot for travel sports and it’s perfect for out of town tournaments! Highly recommend!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great case with customizable compartments
customer_reviews.text: Great case with customizable compartments. Abit pricey considering the console storage area should have more padding. I added more myself but should have came with more side padding. I own a PS4 pro and it has plenty of room.

customer_reviews.title: Feels great. Did what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: All straps are movable and velcro attaching. You can put anything anywhere. Held my ps4, headset and 2 controllers with spare room. All very snug. Would deff recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Best bag ever
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why I didn’t look for this sooner. We have traveled so many times lugging the PlayStation in whatever bag we could find. This is a blessing. Even traveled the airlines over Xmas with it. Fabulous!!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my husband for his PS4 and he loves it. Fits all the components well and keeps them protected. Nice to have it in its own case instead of knocking around whatever random bag he found to put it in. The top organisation compartment is extra helpful for the controls, etc.

It's a camera and laptop carry case and the pics i submitted show lots of compartments that wouldn't even allow a playstation to be carried in it. In any event....its not what I ordered as pictured in the description. I'm returning it.

product_meta.title: USA GEAR Console Carrying Case - PS4 Case Compatible with Playstation 4 Slim, PS4 Pro, and PS3 - Customizable Interior Stores PS4 Games, PS4 Controller, PS4 Headset, and More Gaming Accessories (Blue)
feature_bullets: DURABLE DESIGN: Made with tightly woven RipStop Nylon over a reinforced shell and scratch resistant interior, our PS4 Pro Case provides the ultimate protection for you console and gaming accessories
LARGER THAN THE COMPETITION: Be it controllers, cables, headphones, VR headset, or anything else you need, the customizable and spacious interior can hold it all. Fits all PS4 and PS3 Console Models
EXTERNAL ZIPPERED POCKET: For even more storage and customization, our PS4 bag features external pockets for smaller items like HDMI cables, power cables, and anything else you need quick access to
PADDED SHOULDER STRAP & HANDLE: The S13 features 2 convenient carrying options to sling over your shoulder or comfortably carry in hand || Padded dividers provide extra protection for your gear

3 YEAR WARRANTY: All USA Gear products are premium quality made, and to show our faith in this, we back all our merchandise by a 3 year Manufacturer Warranty || Exterior Dimensions: 15 x 12 x 6 inches
